column4: can anyone here help me troubleshoot my random freezes on Jaunty?
it's better if you ask specific technical questions rather than for help, not too many people want to hand hold.
understood, but I don't even know where to begin. Nothing is showing up in var/log/messages
start with hardware. mem check etc.
I have no problems when I boot into CentOS
then figure out what is different, video card wise, kernel wise. the big stuff, then to applications. What are you doing when it freezes etc.
Sometimes I'm not doing anything.. that's what's so weird.  Shouldn't there be something some log?
I only know of dmesg and var/log/messages.. are there other logs to check?
not if it's a total crash, sounds like video to me, what card? what drivers?
yeah, that's a good one to check.  i'll look into that
i actually have an ati card, and it's using the nvidia driver
that's amazing is compiz is working
I have never heard of that.
I used to have an nvidia card in this system.  Now it's an ati
